author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39432, remove the option to update an entries repository
root from svn_wc__tweak_entry. The repository root is a primary key in
WC-NG and should only be updated via the relocate apis.
(svn_client__update_internal): Remove call to update repos root.
(svn_wc__tweak_entry): Remove repos argument and update documentation.

author: rhuijben
msg: Deprecate svn_wc_revert3() for a new variant taking a wc context and
(revert_entry): Take an absolute instead of a relative path.
Calculate relative path for avoiding deletion of the current
(revert_internal): Take absolute path and remove access baton.
Calculate relative path for tree conflicts.
(svn_wc_revert4): ... this and take absolute path and wc context.

author: pburba
msg: Fix broken JavaHL test on Windows.
with '\' path separators.  Previous to this change we joined this with
'/iota' resulting in a mixed separator path that caused spurious failures
on Windows.  With this change fileToSVNPath() is used to canonicalize the
path so it contains all '/' path separators.

author: danielsh
msg: Following up to r39487, fix validation by adding a tag.

author: markphip
msg: * www/links.html: Add link to CollabNet TeamForge.
